You have to copy the crack and replace it with the exe file in the gamesystem folder. Its to trick the CD drive that the game CD is mounted. Some games just requires ISO files to be mounted via mounting programs. Personaly I prefer the games where I just have to unrar and install, or just even unrar and play.

Ok sorry for spaming, but thats what you get when there aint any edit options here. Well for you guys who say you cant find the crack. Mount the third .cue file and then click My computer. There you will find a virtual room aplyed to this game. Right click and choose open or explore, there you will find the crack. I know it would be hard for new beginners to know this since its pretty hidden. But this is the case for many of the games me and you are downloading. If you download a game with 1-3 or more cd's, its mainly found in either the first cd or the last. But it doesnt hurt to just check the other ones if you cant find it there. If a crack doesnt follow with your game you could try out www.gamecopyworlds.com

I nearly ever have any problems finding cracks for a game, unless is a rare game which nobody plays. Have fun! And btw, please check out my comment above and see if you can help me. Cheers.

ok easy instructions to make it work:

-mount rld-thua.bin on the CD1 folder with DAEMON tools
-install the game, use this key:
BUUG-CFB3-2CKA-UYMG-E15F
-make sure to load CD1,2 and 3 during the installation on ONE driver (empty disk 1 then mount disk 2).
-go to the crack folder on CD3 and copy THUG2.exe to:
C:\program files\Activision\Tony Hawk's Underground 2\Game
-start game

Do you have a CD in your physical CD/DVD drive? I've noticed sometimes you have to remove any other discs. Some programs search your lowest letter drive first, see a different disc, and give up.

Try removing any discs from the physical CD/DVD drive and mount THUG 2 CD 1 in your first virtual drive.
